text: Shizhe [mu sheng] quexin cong ta de zhu jiang shi ta de jingdian [“gulanjing”], xinshimen ye yiyang, quanbu xinyang an la, tianshimen, jingdian he shizhemen.[Tamen shuo]:“Women jue bu qishi ta de shizhe zhong de renhe yi wei.” Tamen shuo:“Women tingjianle, women fucongle. Women de zhu a! Women qiqiu ni de kuanshu, wei ni shi [women] zuihou de guisu.”
